2.title: Elijah Taken Up
2.keyEvent: Elijah ascends to heaven; Elisha succeeds him

3.title: Alliance Against Moab
3.keyEvent: Kings unite and defeat Moab with divine help

4.title: Elisha's Miracles
4.keyEvent: Elisha performs miracles including raising a child

5.title: Naaman Healed
5.keyEvent: Naaman is cleansed of leprosy by Elisha

6.title: Elisha's Protection
6.keyEvent: Elisha reveals and defeats Aramean plans

7.title: Siege Lifted
7.keyEvent: Elisha prophesies end of famine and deliverance

8.title: Elisha and Hazael
8.keyEvent: Hazael's rise foretold; Jehoram's reign in Judah

9.title: Jehu Anointed King
9.keyEvent: Jehu anointed to destroy Ahab's house

10.title: Jehu's Purge
10.keyEvent: Jehu executes judgment on Ahab's family

11.title: Joash Crowned King
11.keyEvent: Joash becomes king of Judah after Athaliah's death

12.title: Joash's Reforms
12.keyEvent: Joash repairs the temple in Jerusalem

14.title: Kings of Israel and Judah
14.keyEvent: Jeroboam II restores Israel's borders; Amaziah reigns

15.title: Judah's Kings
15.keyEvent: Reigns of Azariah, Jotham, and Ahaz in Judah

17.title: Israel's Exile
17.keyEvent: Israel's sin leads to Assyrian captivity

18.title: Hezekiah's Reforms
18.keyEvent: Hezekiah trusts God; Assyrian threat repelled

19.title: Assyrian Siege Defeated
19.keyEvent: God delivers Jerusalem from Sennacherib's army

20.title: Hezekiah's Illness
20.keyEvent: Hezekiah healed; God extends his life

21.title: Manasseh's Wickedness
21.keyEvent: Manasseh's evil reign and Judah's decline

22.title: Josiah's Reforms
22.keyEvent: Book of the Law found; Josiah restores worship

23.title: Josiah's Covenant
23.keyEvent: Josiah purges idolatry; renews covenant with God

25.title: Babylonian Exile
25.keyEvent: Jerusalem destroyed; people taken captive to Babylon
